text: læa phwk cea cng xya briphokh cak sing thi phranam khx ngxallxhˌ midi thuk klaw bn man læa thæcring man penkar lameid næ «læa thæcring br rda chay txn nan ca krasibkrasab kæ brrda shay khxng man pheux phwk khea ca di totheiyng kab phwk cea læa tha hak phwk cea cheuxfang phwk khea nænxn phwk cea k pen phu hı mi phakhi khun
